review.title: “Q-Principle drives passion and awareness in developing relationships with those that you work with and for.”
review.pros: Pros – Independent growth opportunities allow you to drive your own direction and success. Program design is involved and collaborative. Execution allows personality to shine through.
review.cons: Cons – Independent consultancy means you eat what you kill - no salaries.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Don't just talk about the big picture, embrace the future and take the lumps of growth.
